markdownRemark.html:
So, you might be wondering about something I mention on the home page.

hack an online stem trivia quiz and win lots of money even though I told them I hacked it

This is about that story...

How it all started

It was spring semester of sophmore year. Almost two years ago as of now. I was sitting in semminar, an extra class we had to work on assignments, visit teachers, and the like.

frontmatter.title: That Time I Hacked a Quiz and Won 2.5k
